pages.text: A $(item)Wind Charge$() is a consumable ranged weapon that can knock entities back and interact with certain $(l:redstone/redstone_components)Redstone components$(). $(br2)It is used by $(l:creatures/monster-breeze)$(thing)Breezes$() as their main attack and can also be shot by $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() and $(l:redstone/redstone_components#dispenser)$(item)Dispensers$().
